article_title: Laredo Medical Center offering Affordable Care Act enrollment sessions
article_text:
If you still haven't enrolled in health insurance under the Affordable Care Act, the Laredo Medical Center will be offering information sessions.

The first one is happening on November 21 from 9:00 am to 1:00 pm at the LMC Community Center.

To RSVP for the sessions, you can call 796- 2710.

There will also be a session on December 19 and January 16.
